title: BioWorldR: A Curated Collection of Biodiversity and Species Datasets and Utilities
text: BioWorldR package provides curated diverse collection datasets focused biodiversity, species distributions, biological measurements. includes data covering birds, plants, reptiles, turtles, mammals, bees, marine organisms, ecological traits. package integrates datasets sourced public repositories, ecological R packages, open-access databases, offering standardized access facilitate research, education, data analysis biodiversity, biogeography, ecology, comparative biology. datasets encompass wide variety formats content, including species occurrence records, trait measurements, ecological interactions, population dynamics, conservation-related information. centralizing well-documented examples, BioWorldR simplifies teaching, prototyping, reproducible workflows, exploratory analyses biological sciences.

title: BioWorldR: A Curated Collection of Biodiversity and Species Datasets and Utilities
text: dataset BioWorldR package uses suffix denote type R object: _df: data frame _list: list _tbl_df: tibble

title: BioWorldR: A Curated Collection of Biodiversity and Species Datasets and Utilities
text: selected example datasets included BioWorldR package: Reptiles_df: dataset contains valid names url addresses reptile species cataloged Reptile Database Gorillas_df: Chest-beating rates Gorillas. Brain_animals: Brain weight versus body weight 28 animals

previous_headings: Introduction > Data Visualization with BioWorldR Data
what: Brain weight versus body weight of 28 animals
title: BioWorldR: A Curated Collection of Biodiversity and Species Datasets and Utilities
code: Brain_animals %>%   # Select only the species and bodyweight columns   select(species, brainweight) %>%   # Create the bar chart   ggplot(aes(x = reorder(species, brainweight), y = brainweight)) +   geom_col(fill = "steelblue") +   coord_flip() +  # Flip coordinates for better readability   labs(     title = "Brainweight of Different Animal Species",     x = "Species",     y = "Brainweight "   ) +   theme_minimal()

title: BioWorldR: A Curated Collection of Biodiversity and Species Datasets and Utilities
text: BioWorldR package provides curated collection biodiversity species-related datasets, covering wide range taxa including birds, plants, reptiles, turtles, mammals, bees, marine organisms. gathering standardizing datasets public repositories ecological R packages, enables researchers, educators, students easily access well-documented examples use biodiversity, ecology, biogeography, comparative biology. package supports data exploration, visualization, reproducible workflows, educational purposes, making valuable tool teaching applied research. detailed information full documentation dataset, please refer reference manual help files included within package.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Juan David Monroy. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Monroy J (2025). BioWorldR: Curated Biodiversity Species Datasets R. R package version 0.1.0, https://github.com/Monroy31039/BioWorld.
